create_your_shipments_label.sling:message: Create your shipments faster by setting default shipment settings that can be used every time you ship. You can always choose other options during shipment creation, but the defaults set here will be pre-populated to make your shipping experience even faster.

i_usually_enter_an_insurance_value_that_.sling:message: I usually enter an insurance value that is equal to the declared value of my shipment

i_usually_enter_an_insurance_value_of_la.sling:message: I usually enter an insurance value of:

i_would_like_my_pickup_default_to_be_lab.sling:message: I would like my pickup default to be

I typically want my shipments picked up at the following location:

i_typically_want_my_shipments_picked_up_.sling:message: I typically want my shipments picked up during the following hours:

ask_me_whether_i_need_a_return_shipping_.sling:message: Ask me whether I need a return shipping label...

i_typically_send_the_return_shipping_lab.sling:message: I typically send the return shipping label to the recipient...

i_typically_include_the_following_instru.sling:message: I typically include the following instructions with my return shipments

when_you_have_an_incomplete_shipment_lab.sling:message: When you have an incomplete shipment, the system can ask you if you want to save the shipment for later.

ask_me_if_i_would_like_to_save_incomplet.sling:message: Ask me if I would like to save incomplete shipments for later

update_printer_success_message.sling:message: You have successfully updated Printer Settings.

printer_settings_select_printer_type.sling:message: Use the following printer when I print my DHL shipping label

printer_settings_print_shipments_receipt.sling:message: I typically print the shipping receipt

packaging_settings_popup_package_using.sling:message: This packaging is used for shipping:

packaging_settings_popup_pallet_message.sling:message: Text about a pallet will be displayed to the user here.

are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete.sling:message: Are you sure you want to delete these items?

default_my_som_to.sling:message: Default My Unit of Measure to:

nfn_shr__info.sling:message: You can save time when creating shipments by setting up how you want notifications and emails sent:

nfn_shr__info_notification.sling:message: Notifications - allow you to keep yourself, recipients and others informed of the in-transit and delivery status of a shipment.

nfn_shr__info_sharing.sling:message: Sharing - allows you to send an email with shipment details, such as the tracking number or shipping label, to others.

nfn_shr__success_msg.sling:message: You have successfully updated Sharing Settings

nfn_shr__default_sender_heading.sling:message: Set Your Default Sender Email Address

nfn_shr__default_sender_info.sling:message: Shipment emails are sent from a DHL address, but you can set up a different sender email address if preferred.

nfn_shr__shipm_status_info.sling:message: Set up the default notifications for the different statuses and recipients. Then whenever you create a shipment these notifications will always be sent as the shipment moves through DHL's network for that shipment.

nfn_shr__shipm_status_label.sling:message: Always send a notification for these statuses:

nfn_shr__shipm_status_help.sling:message: You can also set these defaults by individual contact in your address book.

nfn_shr__shipm_status_user_none.sling:message: Do Not Send Me Any Notifications

nfn_shr__shipm_status_small_text.sling:message: * You can also set these defaults by individual contact in your

nfn_shr__shipm_details_info.sling:message: After you create a shipment, you may like to share some of the shipment details with others, such as the Tracking number or shipping label, by sending them an email.

nfn_shr__shipm_details_more_text.sling:message:
If you frequently share the same details, you can set up defaults so that whenever you create a shipment, those you’ve indicated will get an email with the specific shipment details.
  • Select who you want to send emails to
  • Then select the type of email template you want to send

nfn_shr__shipm_details_label.sling:message: I always want to share shipment details with:

nfn_shr__shipm_details_input_label.sling:message: I also want to share shipment details with:

nfn_shr__email_tpl_dhl_label.sling:message: I want to use the DHL Email Template as my default

nfn_shr__email_tpl_dhl_info.sling:message: These are the shipment details I always want to share (select all that apply):

nfn_shr__email_tpl_dhl_confirm_num.sling:message: Pickup confirmation number (when pickups are scheduled)

nfn_shr__email_msg_label.sling:message: I also always want to include this message in the share email

nfn_shr__email_tpl_set_default_label.sling:message: I want to use My Custom Email Template as my default.

nfn_shr__email_tpl_help_slide_text_1.sling:message: If you want to personalize the shipping emails so that they look like they come from your company instead of DHL, you can create your own custom email template . You can include your own personalized message, select the details you want to share and even include your company logo!

nfn_shr__email_tpl_editor_label.sling:message: Create the message you want to appear in the email

ship_ref__intro.sling:message: When creating shipments you can add a reference which will appear on the shipment waybill/label. You can set up your commonly used references so that you can quickly select them as you create shipments.

ship_ref__label_info.sling:message: If you typically use the reference for a specific purpose, you can rename it in MyDHL as a helpful reminder of what you use it for.

ship_ref__delete_elements_confirmation_m.sling:message: Are you sure you want to delete these references?

ship_ref__nfn_shr__mdl_error_message.sling:message: There is already the entry with the same name. Please provide another one

ship_ref__mdl_error_msg.sling:message: There is already the entry with the same name. Please provide another one

ship_ref__mdl_reject.sling:message: Sorry but something gone wrong on a page

digital_customs_invoices_header_message.sling:message: DHL allows our account holders to send Customs Invoices digitally to the local customs authorities for many destination countries around the world. This time saving service eliminates the need to print and attach documents to your shipments. Best of all, it helps speed up clearance through customs!

digital_customs_invoices_success_message.sling:message: You are now enrolled in paperless trade.

digital_customs_invoices_must_accept_ter.sling:message: You must agree and accept the terms and conditions.

digital_customs_invoices_help_message.sling:message: When you enroll, we'll send your Customs Invoice documents digitally - whether you create them via MyDHL or use your own invoices.

digital_customs_invoices_help_item1.sling:message: You can pause this service if needed via your Profile after enrolling.

digital_customs_invoices_help_item2.sling:message: This service is not available when paying for shipping with a credit card.

digital_customs_invoices_help_item3.sling:message: If the destination country accepts this service, it will be enabled when you create shipments.

digital_customs_invoices_help_item4.sling:message: It's easy to enroll and start using this time saving service! Just upload your electronic signature, your company logo and accept our terms and conditions.

digital_customs_invoices_enroll.sling:message: Yes, I would like to enroll

digital_customs_invoices_currently_enrol.sling:message: You are currently enrolled to send your Customs Invoices digitally.

digital_customs_invoices_may_pause.sling:message: You may pause this function, or edit your information as needed.

digital_customs_invoices_would_generate.sling:message: Would you like DHL to generate your customs documents for you?

digital_customs_invoices_dhl_generated.sling:message: I will use DHL generated customs documentation

digital_customs_invoices_my_own.sling:message: I will use my own customs documentation

digital_customs_invoices_electronic_sign.sling:message: Customs requires your electronic signature on digital Customs Invoices. Upload a file with your written signature.

digital_customs_invoices_company_logo_de.sling:message: You may also upload a file with your company logo.

digital_customs_invoices_upload_file_typ.sling:message: File Types: JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF

delivery_options_default__shipment_type_.sling:message: I want this to be my default Shipment Type:

delivery_options_default__documents_info.sling:message: Documents include legal, financial, or business paperwork. Items with monetary value are not documents.

delivery_options_default__documents_labe.sling:message: When I ship documents, I typically ship with the same description every time.

delivery_options_default__documents_plac.sling:message: Optionally enter a default document description. This can be changed during shipment creation.

delivery_options_default__packages_info.sling:message: Packages are goods, merchandise or commodities for personal or commercial purposes.

delivery_options_default__option.sling:message: I want this to be my default Delivery Option:

delivery_options_default__country.sling:message: I typically ship to the following country:

delivery_options_express_dayend.sling:message: Deliver by end of day - EXPRESS Worldwide

customs_clearance_default__subheading.sling:message: Shipping internationally requires a customs invoice.

customs_clearance_default__label.sling:message: When I ship internationally, I typically:

customs_clearance_default__create_invoic.sling:message: I would like DHL to create a Customs Invoice using the information that I entered.

customs_clearance_default__own_invoice_i.sling:message: I have a printed Customs Invoice that I will provide with the shipment.

customs_clearance_default__purpose_label.sling:message: When I create a customs invoice the purpose of my shipment is typically:

customs_clearance_default__description_l.sling:message: When I use my own customs invoice my shipment description is typically:

customs_clearance_default__description_p.sling:message: What are the items called, what are they made of, what will they be used for?

customs_clearance_default__value_label.sling:message: When I use my own customs invoice the value of my shipment is typically:

customs_clearance_default__incoterms_sub.sling:message: Incoterms are globally recognized terms used for international shipments.

customs_clearance_default__incoterms_lab.sling:message: When I ship internationally, I typically use the following incoterm:

customs_clearance_default__incoterms_inf.sling:message: Incoterms® (International Commercial Terms) make trade clearer by ensuring everybody - regardless of country or region - is on the same page when it comes to their delivery responsibilities, costs and the allocation of risks between buyers and sellers. For definitions, visit our Help Center.

address_entry__label.sling:message: Default all future address book entries as residential.

my_product_list_description.sling:message: Save time and steps when creating shipments! Create and maintain a list of your company's products or any items you ship frequently so that you can quickly select them when creating a Customs Invoice.

my_product_list_added.sling:message: List has been added to your product catalog

my_product_list_error.sling:message: There is a problem while updating catalog

my_product_form_item_description_info_ti.sling:message: A detailed description answers the following:

my_product_form_item_description_info3.sling:message: What will it be used for?

my_product_form_item_description_example.sling:message: Example: 'Mens knitted sweater, 100% cotton for personal use.'

my_product_form_country_info.sling:message: For customs purposes choose the country where the item you are shipping was made, produced or grown.

my_product_form_quantity_info1.sling:message: Please enter the number of each unique item you are shipping.

my_product_form_quantity_info2.sling:message: Complete a separate entry for any different items.

my_product_form_item_value_info1.sling:message: This is the price of your good or fair market value.

my_product_form_item_value_info2.sling:message: The value will be multiplied to reflect the total value for each set of unique items.

my_product_form_net_weight_info1.sling:message: Please enter the net weight of each unique item.

my_product_form_net_weight_info2.sling:message: The weight will be multiplied to reflect the total net weight for each set of unique items.

my_product_form_gross_weight_info1.sling:message: Please enter the gross weight of each unique item.

my_product_form_gross_weight_info2.sling:message: The weight will be multiplied to reflect the total gross weight for each set of unique items.

my_product_form_will_import.sling:message: I will also be importing this product

assign_ship_allow_shipment_assigning.sling:message: Give me the option to assign shipments

assign_ship_when_assigning.sling:message: When assigning shipments to another individual

assign_ship_hide_account.sling:message: I typically want my DHL Account number hidden

assign_ship_hide_rates.sling:message: I typically want my account-based rates to be hidden

assign_ship_require_login.sling:message: I typically require assigned individuals to login to MyDHL in order to complete my shipments

assign_ship_assignee_edit_address.sling:message: I typically grant assigned individuals the ability to edit the pickup address for the assigned shipment

assign_ship_shipment_approve.sling:message: I typically want to approve any shipment that has been assigned if the DHL delivery option is changed by the assigned individual

assign_ship_follow_instructions.sling:message: I typically include the following instructions when I assign shipments

assign_ship_apply_restrictions.sling:message: I typically apply the following restrictions to the shipments that I assign

assign_ship_insurance_can_be_added.sling:message: Insurance can be added to the shipment

assign_ship_insured_value.sling:message: Insured value will have a max value of

assign_ship_not_complete.sling:message: Notify me if the shipment has not been completed at the end of the requested shipment date.

assign_ship_is_complete.sling:message: Notify me when the shipment is complete.

assign_ship_pickup.sling:message: Notify me when a pickup has been requested for this shipment.

assign_ship_picked.sling:message: Notify me when this shipment has been picked up by DHL.

assign_ship_declined.sling:message: Notify me if the shipment is declined.
